actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the act of April 7, 1956, relating to the lower Rio Grande rehabilitation project, Texas, Mercedes division.

summary.text: Authorizes the Hidalgo and Cameron Counties Water Control and Improvement District Number 9, Texas, to construct a water metering system, pumping plant, and replacement pumps and motors, under the Rio grande rehabilitation project, Mercedes division.

titles.title: A bill to amend the act of April 7, 1956, relating to the lower Rio Grande rehabilitation project, Texas, Mercedes division.
